Method Detail

post

public static void post(java.lang.String endpoint,
                        java.lang.String body,
                        boolean encryptData)
                 throws EncryptionException,
                        java.io.IOException
Issue a POST request to the server.

Parameters:
endpoint - Host url
body - as a JSON string.
encryptData - true to encrypt the data being sent, false to not worry about it. Only encrypt the calls that need to be encrypted. Everything can be encrypted however there is more overhead when encrypting everything.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
java.lang.Exception
EncryptionException

getDigitalSignature

public static java.lang.String getDigitalSignature(java.lang.String httpMethod,
                                                   java.lang.String timeStamp,
                                                   java.lang.String requestBody)
                                            throws java.security.SignatureException
Get the digital signature to be a part of the authentication header.

Parameters:
httpMethod - uppercase HTTP request method (e.g. GET, POST)
timeStamp - use getTimeStamp()
requestBody -
Returns:
digital signature
Throws:
java.security.SignatureException
